column2: dobro player, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I have been taking Klor-Con for a couple years twice a day.  Last year in May, I started getting nauseated at different times of day.  I went to several Drs, I was also dizzy.  Even tho the Drs said the nausea and dizziness could not be drugs, I started eliminating the Klor-con (after reading the reviews).  It has been a week now, and I have not been nauseated once.  I will now have to eat more potassium-rich foods.
